{{TeyvatQuest|0|1|part=1}}

==Steps==
# Follow the path
# Go to Paimon
# Talk to Paimon
# Follow Paimon
# Swim to the island in [[Starfell Lake]]

==Gameplay Notes==
* Walking too far away from Paimon during Step 5 resets back to Step 4 and shows a notice on-screen until the player returns:
** Return to quest point {{DIcon|Quest}} {{Key|Left Ctrl|F}}
* Completing this quest unlocks the ability to use [[Elemental Skill]]s and [[Elemental Burst]]s.

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|You begin your journey in [[Starfell Valley]], exploring the land and seeing its sights together with Paimon.}}
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Approach the ledge)
:{{A|vo mdaq005 1 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Oh wowwwww!
:;(After admiring the scenery)
:{{A|vo mdaq006 3 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' That's a [[Statue of The Seven]]!
:{{A|vo mdaq006 3 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' There are a few of these statues scattered across the land to show [[The Seven]]'s protection over the world.
:{{A|vo mdaq006 3 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Among the seven gods, this god controls the wind.
:{{A|vo mdaq006 3 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon's not sure whether the god you're looking for is the Anemo God, but...
:{{A|vo mdaq006 3 paimon 05.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon'll take you to the [[Anemo God]]'s place first, and there's a reason why~
----
;(If the player walks away from the quest area)
:'''Paimon:''' Hey! Where are you going? Come to Paimon!
:'''Paimon:''' Don't stray too far from Paimon!

;(If the player continues to walk away from quest area)
:'''Paimon:''' You should follow {{Color|buzzword|Paimon}} for now...
----
;(Follow Paimon to the Statue of the Seven)
:{{A|vo mdaq006 4 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' As we all know, poetry and language flow like the wind...
:{{A|vo mdaq006 4 paimon 02a.ogg}} {{A|vo mdaq006 4 paimon 02b.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' There'll definitely be someone there who knows about your {{MC|sister|brother|mc=1}}. At least, that's what Paimon thinks!
:{{A|vo mdaq006 4 paimon 03.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Whether the gods actually answer you is a different story. You never know unless you try.
:{{A|vo mdaq006 4 paimon 04.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' So, let's hop to it!
:;(When the player reaches the lake)
:{{A|vo mdaq007 5 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' You can {{Color|buzzword|swim}} right over!
{{Dialogue End}}
